name: VoiceGopher
0:
”Alexa ask VoiceGopher what is biggest value of column number 0 in spreadsheet 1”
”Alexa ask VoiceGopher what is average value of column number 0 in spreadsheet 1”
”Alexa ask VoiceGopher what is standard deviation of column number 0 in spreadsheet 1”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice gopher
Developer Terms of Use
des:
VoiceGopher is designed to simplify and vocalize the routine work with spreadsheets.
This will be helpful for people who are away from their actual machines or running audio presentations or are interested in spot metrics. We also got great feedback from visually impaired users who volunteered to be engaged in our beta program. We realize that skill has long way till it's maturity, but we believe that it will add new way of work and communication with spreadsheets.
